verses.verse: And of the <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H899>cloths<s%> of <S%H8278>service<s%>, to do <S%H8334>service<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8438%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>.

And they did <S%H7554>beat<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H854>into<s%> thin <S%H6341>plates<s%>, and <S%H7112>cut<s%> it into <S%H6616>wires<s%>, to <S%H6213%H8432>work<s%> it in the <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and in the <S%H713>purple<s%>, and in the <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and in the fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, with <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>.
They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3802>shoulderpieces<s%> for it, to couple it <S%H2266>together<s%>: by the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098%H7099>edges<s%> was it coupled <S%H2266>together<s%>.

And the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of his <S%H642>ephod<s%>, that was upon it, was of the same, according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> thereof; of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H4142>inclosed<s%> in <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H6605>graven<s%>, as <S%H2368>signets<s%> are <S%H6603>graven<s%>, with the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, that they should be <S%H68>stones<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>, like the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>; of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>.

It was <S%H7251>foursquare<s%>; they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H3717>double<s%>: a <S%H2239>span<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H2239>span<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, being <S%H3717>doubled<s%>.

And they <S%H4390>set<s%> in it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>: the first <S%H2905>row<s%> was a <S%H124>sardius<s%>, a <S%H6357>topaz<s%>, and a <S%H1304>carbuncle<s%>: this was the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>.
And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>, an <S%H5306>emerald<s%>, a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>, and a <S%H3095>diamond<s%>.
And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>, a <S%H3958>ligure<s%>, an <S%H7618>agate<s%>, and an <S%H306>amethyst<s%>.

And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>, a <S%H8658>beryl<s%>, an <S%H7718>onyx<s%>, and a <S%H3471>jasper<s%>: they were <S%H4142>inclosed<s%> in <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in their <S%H4396>inclosings<s%>.

And the <S%H68>stones<s%> were according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%>, according to their <S%H8034>names<s%>, like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H8034>name<s%>, according to the <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> upon the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> at the <S%H1383>ends<s%>, of <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%>; and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.
And they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> wreathen <S%H5688>chains<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H5688>chains<s%> they <S%H5414>fastened<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>ouches<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulderpieces<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4136>it<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>, upon the <S%H8193>border<s%> of it, which was on the <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H1004>inward<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> other <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H4295>underneath<s%>, <S%H4136>toward<s%> the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> of it, over <S%H5980>against<s%> the other <S%H4225>coupling<s%> thereof, <S%H4605>above<s%> the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

And they did <S%H7405>bind<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> by his <S%H2885>rings<s%> unto the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, that it might be above the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and that the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> might not be <S%H2118>loosed<s%> from the <S%H646>ephod<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
¶ And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>, <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>.

And there was an <S%H6310>hole<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%>, as the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of an <S%H8473>habergeon<s%>, with a <S%H8193>band<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H6310>hole<s%>, that it should not <S%H7167>rend<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> upon the <S%H7757>hems<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and <S%H7806>twined<s%> linen.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6472>bells<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> upon the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%>, round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%>;

A <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>, a <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>, round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
¶ And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and for his <S%H1121>sons<s%>,

And a <S%H4701>mitre<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H6287>goodly<s%> <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>,

And a <S%H73>girdle<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, of <S%H7551%H4639>needlework<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6731>plate<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> upon it a <S%H4385>writing<s%>, like to the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>, <S%H6944>HOLINESS<s%> TO THE <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>tied<s%> unto it a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, to <S%H5414>fasten<s%> it on <S%H4605>high<s%> upon the <S%H4701>mitre<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ Thus was all the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

¶ And they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, the <S%H168>tent<s%>, and all his <S%H3627>furniture<s%>, his <S%H7165>taches<s%>, his <S%H7175>boards<s%>, his <S%H1280>bars<s%>, and his <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and his <S%H134>sockets<s%>,

And the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H352>rams'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%>, and the <S%H6532>vail<s%> of the <S%H4539>covering<s%>,
The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof, and the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>,
The <S%H7979>table<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and the <S%H6440%H3899>shewbread<s%>,

The <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, with the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof, even with the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to be set in <S%H4634>order<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for <S%H3974>light<s%>,

And the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>,

The <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and his <S%H4345>grate<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, his <S%H905>staves<s%>, and all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot<s%>,

The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, his <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and his <S%H134>sockets<s%>, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, his <S%H4340>cords<s%>, and his <S%H3489>pins<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>,

The <S%H899>cloths<s%> of <S%H8278>service<s%> to do <S%H8334>service<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, to minister in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>.
According to all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> all the <S%H5656>work<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> did <S%H7200>look<s%> upon <S%H3651>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>, and, behold, they had <S%H6213>done<s%> it as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, even so had they <S%H6213>done<s%> it: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them.
